qas.question: Who diverted resources to the destruction of the Partisans?
Who was the opponent of the Allies?
Which group of people wanted to capture Tito personally?
In 1944 where did Tito manage to avoid the Germans?
What type of assault was there in Bosnia?

context: With the growing possibility of an Allied invasion in the Balkans, the <a0_0><a1_0>Axis<a1_0/><a0_0/> began to divert more resources to the destruction of the Partisans main force and its high command. This meant, among other things, a concerted <a2_0>German<a2_0/> effort to capture Josip Broz Tito personally. On 25 May 1944, he managed to evade the Germans after the Raid on <a3_0>Drvar<a3_0/> (Operation Rösselsprung), an <a4_0>airborne<a4_0/> assault outside his Drvar headquarters in Bosnia.
